ygData.subject: Re: Greetingssss
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh sure. 54... easiest thing for me to tell you is to look for people around that level and go group with them. I don t know to be perfectly honest all
ygData.messageBody:
Oh sure. 54... easiest thing for me to tell you
is to look for people around that level and go group
with them.<br><br>I don't know to be perfectly honest
all the things they do but on Drinal, I know a lot of
50+ people or those getting up there. I know that
some like KC, and Velk's is a very popular place.
Cobalt Shrine seems popular for its non-named dragons as
well (b/c named ones give faction hits).<br><br>Those
are all interesting places. Ppl in my guild that are
50+ I believe are Kala, Arso, Waubau, Bubila, Barrio
and a few others.<br><br>We also have this tendency
for our Enchanters to rise far and above the speed
that any other class goes up. So even though our
chanters are now 43-- if they are like Valayna and
Andarvi, they shall rise up about a level every few days
till they hit 50 in about two or three
months.<br><br>Just some general tips for the Necro on Drinal server.
Plus check out UGOD (United Guilds of Drinal). I would
also highly suggest visiting guild websites and posts.
Always good suggestions there. I go to my guild's boards
at
<br><a href=http://pub73.ezboard.com/btribunal58632 target=new>http://pub73.ezboard.com/btribunal58632</a><br><br>And Soulbonded (one of 4 Guilds in the Drinal
Alliance):<br><a href=http://pub28.ezboard.com/bsoulbonded71563 target=new>http://pub28.ezboard.com/bsoulbonded71563</a><br><br>I would also highly suggest checking with your
guild. Whenever I get stumped about Exp or go into a
slump-- usually Guild or friends on my whois list are the
first to pull me out of hard spots.<br><br>If you don't
have a guild, then I would highly suggest getting one.
I love my own guild, Tribunal of Antiquity. So I
have to suggest my own. Problem is-- we no longer have
anyone one as high as 54+ as they left to more uber
guilds. We're a good family group though. <br><br>Many of
them are in Guardians of the Keep so they must be
pretty decent. I would also highly recommend Soulbonded
as their guild leader rocks and their boards are
good and decent number are around 54+ so you could get
good groups easily. Probably do a few Kael raids and
PoH etc raids with them or the Drinal Alliance. All
the Drinal Alliance ppl have really good reps. White
Wind, Silver Hawks, Soul Bonded, Phoenix
Order.<br><br>shooman out<br>Fatedhue Prismatic of the Drinal server
